articles.author: Stefanie Waldek
articles.title: A total lunar eclipse will turn the moon red the night of May 15 - Space.com
articles.description: It will be visible from the Americas, Europe, Africa, the Middle East, the eastern Pacific, the South Pacific and even Antarctica.
articles.content:
Hot on the heels of the year's first solar eclipse — a partial eclipse on April 30 — a total lunar eclipse is on the horizon.

articles.author: Pam Kragen
articles.title: Rare fossil of ancient dog species discovered by paleontologists - Phys.org
articles.description: Sometime around 14,000 years ago, the first humans crossed the Bering Strait to North America with canines, domesticated dogs they used for hunting, by their side.
articles.content:

articles.author: Megan C. Hills and Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: These Met Gala looks paid homage to the marginalized people of the Gilded Age - CNN
articles.description: A-list attendees like Gabrielle Union and Sarah Jessica Parker interpreted the Met Gala theme from the perspective of marginalized people whose labor made the Gilded Age of the late 19th century so prosperous for White Americans.
articles.content:
The Met Gala returned to its typical first Monday in May date this week, and celebrities honored this year's theme of "gilded glamour" with cinched waists, trailing coattails and tulle aplenty. 
Som… [+4163 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19 Pandemic Disrupted Dengue Transmission - Contagionlive.com
articles.description: Historically low incidence of dengue in southeast Asia and Latin America linked to COVID-19 restrictions suggests potential future interventions.
